content: Multitool wood plunge cut blade High carbon steel (HCS) plunge cut blade for the oscillating multitool, for plunge cuts in wood, drywall, and plywood ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Multi-tool inserts ### FEATURES:Features Increased versatility – quickly swap out plunge cut blade attachments to cover a wide range of base materials and applications More sustainable - adapt the Hilti SMT-6 multitool for different applications and base materials by switching inserts, without stocking multiple tools More flexibility – Starlock interface is compatible with all Starlock multitools on the market Easier to change inserts - Starlock compatible interface for a safer and more convenient tool-free insert change Applications High carbon steel (HCS) blade for plunge cuts and cut-outs in softwood, drywall, plywood, and OSB Expand the range of applications possible with the Hilti multitool ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2368500 - Plunge cut blade SMT HCS wood - Package Size 1 pc - 3867279 - Plunge Cut Blade Wood (3-Pack) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 3x Plunge cut blade SMT HCS wood - 3867280 - Plunge Cut Blade Hardwood (3-Pack) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 3x Plunge cut blade SMT BiM hardwood
